Supports interactive configuration core branding elements (name, color, logos) provides options advanced customization via template editing (typography, palettes, etc.). Brand configurations can saved project-level, global (system-wide), locations reuse across projects. New function save_brand() enables saving restoring brand configurations global froggeR settings directory. settings() function completely redesigned enhanced interactive workflow: Interactive creation updating metadata (name, email, ORCID, URL, GitHub username, affiliations) Ability save metadata project-level, global, locations Improved user feedback guided workflows, including clearer prompts updating metadata. Better status reporting existing configurations write_brand() gains restore_logos argument enable automatic restoration logo content system configuration (default TRUE). write_ignore() now supports creating either minimal (default) aggressive .gitignore file, providing flexibility project needs.
